column5: Not sure who's luckier Simon... You for having Jack, or Jack for having you! You adopting??? I'm available...
You guys are going to have a blast this season on the sleds! Jack will leave no flake untouched in the yard lol :-P
That's freakin awesome Simon.  Jack is one lucky boy!!!!
I think I feel more lucky only having seen flurries today lol! All joking aside that's awesome!
PERFECT. man they learn quick at that age - from lurch to full throttle in no time. Gotta make sure G doesn't see this one or else I'll be making excuses till lakers open
Nice video Simon, by the looks of those clouds, theres more snow to come
That just makes me smile ... Awesome !
HAHAHAHAHA!!! BLASTIN' ON THE SNOW PIG!  What a fun winter you guys will have!  Thanks for sharing
How much longer till he t-bones the chevy? . Awesome video
thats fantastic Simon..I have enjoyed watching your family grow over the years..To see the dog look after him is great too. You keep up the great work with the young lad. You're doing a fine job!

hahaha this reminds me of the first year we owned our family cottage and dad purchased 2 shiny new sleds, only problem is that it was a warm year then...I remember waking up one morning and the years first snowfall dusting had fallen. The grass was still sticking up through it, next thing i  hear from out in the yard is the familiar BRAP BRAP BRAP, theres the old man ripping the new MXZ on the 2 inches of snow and my mom out on the back deck yelling BRIAN YOU ARE DESTROYING THE GRASS!
